thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: China’s HNA Checks Out Early From Hilton Investment, Netting Windfall

author: Julie Steinberg
title: China’s HNA Checks Out Early From Hilton Investment, Netting Windfall
text:
An early exit from a large investment in the Hilton hotel chain has proved highly profitable for China’s HNA Group Co.
The indebted Chinese conglomerate stands to collect roughly $2 billion in profits from its $6.5 billion Hilton investment, which it made a little over a year ago. That would translate into an over 60% return for HNA, as the company used borrowed money to finance more than half its investment.
...
